input.description:
String value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Example: BMC_AR_System

XML document - The event concept XML containins specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.
Some instances of Input concepts are: adapter name, configuration name, username, password, etc.,. The following sample represents an problem mangement concept.
Example: <Investigations> <Investigation> <problem-id>PBI000000000047</problem-id> <first-name>adapter</first-name> <last-name>user</last-name> <assigned-group>Change Management</assigned-group> <investigation-status>Draft</investigation-status> <investigation-status-reason /> <impact>4-Minor/Localized</impact> <description>TESTname</description> <priority>Low</priority> <priority-weight>0</priority-weight> <assigned-support-org>IT Support</assigned-support-org> <company>Calbro Financial Services</company> <contact-company>Calbro Financial Services</contact-company> <support-org-requester>IT Support</support-org-requester> <support-group-name-requester>Asset Management</support-group-name-requester> <urgency>4-Low</urgency> <investigation-driver>None-Routine Incident</investigation-driver> <investigation-justification /> <action /> <assigned-support-company>Calbro Financial Services</assigned-support-company> <product-cat-tier1 /> <product-cat-tier2 /> <product-cat-tier3 /> <product-name /> <product-model-version /> <manufacturer /> <temporary-workaround /> <generic-categorization-tier1 /> <categorization-tier1 /> <categorization-tier2 /> <categorization-tier3 /> <site-group /> <site>Boston Support Center</site> <region /> <detailed-description /> <pbm-location-address /> </Investigation> </Investigations>

output.description: An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.A concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.

documentation.description: This workflow will update a given solution.
